Subject: National Action Plan for Renewable Energy
Description: One of the requests of the law 138/2013 “On Renewable Energy Resources” and of this Directive is the preparation and the approval of the National Action Plan for Renewable Energy (NREAP), which establishes national objectives of renewable energies in the final total domestic consumption as well as the supporting measures to achieve them.

Subject: Ministry of Energy and Industry
Object: Ministry of Agriculture, Rural Development and Water Administration
Description: The Ministry of Energy and Industry collaborates with the Ministry of Agriculture, Rural Development and Water Administration to identify suitable projects in the sector of agriculture.

Subject: ERE
Description: The Albanian Government and ERE are reviewing bylaws, with the aim of meeting the requirements of the new law on energy sector, including a number of bylaws provided below.

Subject: National Agency of Territorial Planning
Description: The National Agency of Territorial Planning acts as the Technical Secretariat of the National Territorial Council.

Subject: Ministry of Energy and Industry
Description: The Ministry of Energy and Industry addresses the issues and goals of the Republic of Albania.

Subject: Ministry of Energy and Industry
Description: The Ministry of Energy and Industry supports the National Licensing Centre.

Subject: Ministry of Energy and Industry
Description: The Ministry of Energy and Industry supports the State Technical and Industrial Inspectorate.

Subject: National Territory Council
Description: NTC is a collegial body attached to the Council of Ministers.

Subject: Agency for Treatment of Concessions
Description: ATC mission is to support the Contracting Authority to evaluate and negotiate the concessions in all fields of concessions, including the construction of hydropower plants.

Subject: National Agency of Territorial Planning
Description: supports the horizontal coordination between the national authorities in the field of territory planning, with a view of harmonizing issues of national importance addressed in different fields and sectors, bringing together the responsible authorities and interested stakeholders and helping to resolve the conflicts between them

Subject: National Agency of Territorial Planning
Description: conducts studies and assessments for territorial developments and based thereupon, recommends to the Council of Ministers the improvement of legal system for territorial planning and development control instruments or the need to launch planning processes or other appropriate measures

Subject: Kyoto Protocol
Description: MoE exercises the powers of the national authority for Clean Development Mechanism projects defined under the Kyoto Protocol in Albania.

Subject: Ministry of Energy and Industry
Description: The Ministry of Energy and Industry collaborates with the Ministry of Urban Development on energy issues in buildings.

Subject: National Agency of Natural Resources
Description: The National Agency of Natural Resources collaborates with Albanian.

Subject: Albanian
Description: A Memorandum of Understanding is signed between the Albanian and Macedonian transmission system operators for the construction of a new 400 kV line (Elbasan-Bitola).

Subject: Albania
Description: Albanian operator of the transmission system has already completed a new 400 kV interconnection line with Montenegro (Tirana 2 - Podgorica), which increased the capacity of the Albanian system interconnection up to 1000 MW.

Subject: Albania
Description: Currently, OST is working to build a new 400 kV line with Kosovo (Tirana 2 - Pristina), which is expected to be completed in 2016.

Subject: Albania
Description: Private investors have also shown interest to build an underwater cable system linking Albania to Italy.

Subject: National Action Plan for Renewable Energy
Description: The new law on renewable sources (article 11) provides for that operators of network system must optimize, expand and improve the system for connection and transmission of electricity from new power plants that use renewable energy resources, in accordance with the National Action Plan for Renewable Energy.

Subject: Power Sector Law
Object: National Action Plan for Renewable Energy
Description: According to the Power Sector Law (article 28) any costs of connection to the transmission and / or distribution network of a producer of electricity, including RES electricity producers, will be borne by the manufacturer.

Subject: Kyoto Protocol
Description: The law transposes the previous EU Directive2003/30/EC of 8 May 2003 on the promotion of bio-fuels or other renewable fuels used for transport.

Subject: State Technical and Industrial Inspectorate
Object: National Action Plan for Renewable Energies
Description: Every compliance with the objectives set by law for the consumption of bio-fuels and NREAP will be monitored by State Technical and Industrial Inspectorate

Subject: Council of Ministers
Object: National Action Plan for Renewable Energies
Description: The National Action Plan for Renewable Energies will be monitored by the agency responsible for renewable energy resources, which is expected to have authority and powers to monitor compliance with targets set for all renewable resources, including bio-fuels

Subject: Ministry of Environment
Description: areas where natural habitat species of interest to the European Community, as well as other habitats of interest to this community, are declared areas of special conservation

Subject: European Community
Description: areas where natural habitat species of interest to the European Community, as well as other habitats of interest to this community, are declared areas of special conservation

Subject: Regional Forest Service
Description: cases of the change of forest land status

Subject: Albanian
Object: Ministry of Agriculture, Rural Development and Water Administration
Description: This institution is under the Ministry of Agriculture, Rural Development and Water Administration.

Subject: Council of Ministers
Description: The Council of Ministers may enter into agreements with Albania for mutual recognition of guarantees of origin for renewable energy.

Subject: Ministry of Environment
Description: The Ministry of Environment collaborates with the National Agency of Natural Resources to address environmental issues and promote sustainable energy resources.

Subject: Ministry of Energy and Industry
Description: The Ministry of Energy and Industry collaborates with the National Agency of Natural Resources to develop and implement energy policies and strategies.

Subject: Ministry of Public Works and Transport
Description: The Ministry of Public Works and Transport collaborates with the National Agency of Natural Resources to ensure sustainable transportation infrastructure and promote energy-efficient transport.
